posts.post_title: FS - T207 Frank Chance Recruit SGC 4
posts.post_content: For Sale - A T206 Frank Chance with Recruit reverse graded SGC 4.  $385 venmo no fee or $397.50 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
